set terminal png size 800,600
set output '01.png'
set multiplot layout 1,1 rowsfirst title "PSO after 1 steps"
set xlabel 'dimension 0'
set ylabel 'dimension 1'
set xrange [-200:200]
set yrange [-200:200]
set arrow from 28.726638917496,-39.628127971087 to 118.69509515983,-23.261697416085
set arrow from 10.065753336234,33.746939581135 to 10.065753336234,33.746939581135
set arrow from 7.212980661287,35.31066460304 to 24.405880513194,166.12410217639
set arrow from 42.997171779216,-4.6120727666185 to 171.9855635026,84.973751789233
set label "(0)" at 28.726638917496,-39.628127971087
set label "(1)" at 10.065753336234,33.746939581135
set label "(2)" at 7.212980661287,35.31066460304
set label "(3)" at 42.997171779216,-4.6120727666185
set grid
set arrow from -100,-100 to 100,-100 nohead
set arrow from -100,-100 to -100,100 nohead
set arrow from -100,100 to 100,100 nohead
set arrow from 100,-100 to 100,100 nohead
plot   '-' using 1:2 with lines title 'best global attractor footprints', '-' using 1:2 title 'positions', '-' using 1:2 title 'local attractors', '-' using 1:2 title 'global attractors'
10.065753336234 33.746939581135
10.065753336234 33.746939581135
e

unset label
